common_1000_friend_02:
This is the Zero Gate.\c
It was made so researchers could try to observe
the inside of the Great Crater of Paldea...\r
What folks call Area Zero.[npcn:6]
common_1000_friend_03: It’s our ticket down into the crater.[npcn:6]
common_1000_friend_06:
Oh, and speaking of the crater... You know that
Pokémon of yours? The one I gave you?[npcn:6]
common_1000_friend_07:
[BD06:0]Area Zero is apparently where [pknm:1]
was\r
born,\r
or\r
something\r
like that.[npcn:6]
common_1000_friend_08:
Maybe it’ll be happy that it can finally come
back home?[npcn:6]
common_1000_friend_09: Not that I really care or anything...[npcn:6]
common_1000_friend_04:
Anyway, our two new teammates should be
waiting for us inside the Zero Gate.[npcn:6]
